message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. I believe it can greatly benefit your business operations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $10,000 for this product.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I must respectfully decline. Our current pricing strategy takes into account not only the cost of production but also the long-term value and support we provide. Considering these factors, I would like to offer the product for $9,500.
I appreciate your understanding, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. I understand your position and respect your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value proposition and our costs, I would like to offer the product for $9,250.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,750. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

I understand your position, Bob. I've carefully considered your proposal and am willing to offer the product for $8,900. This price reflects the value it brings to your business while also accounting for our production costs and profit margin.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,750, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to my business.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product for $8,600. This price reflects a balance between the value it provides to your business and our operational costs.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $8,500, but I really need to get this price down to $8,000. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price. I'm very interested in the product, but I have a limit to what I can spend.
